meta.name: description
meta.content: Candy Wrapper (CWrap) is an open microframework for web developers and those learning web development.

style: background-color: #f4d04e; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-family: 'Figtree', sans-serif; min-height: 100dvh; margin: 0px; padding: 24px; box-sizing: border-box;

children.style: width: 450px; height: fit-content; background-color: white; border: 1px solid black; border-radius: 20px; display: flex; justify-content: start; padding: 24px; box-sizing: border-box; flex-direction: column; gap: 24px; box-shadow: 8px 8px black; transition: 300ms;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 800; line-height: 150%; transition: 150ms; font-size:24px; color: #000000; text-decoration: none;

children.text:
CWrap is a microframework for web developers and those learning web development. Its key features include:
üë∂ Low entry level, making it accessible for beginners
‚ú® Automatic CSS generation
üîç Autocompletion for faster coding
üëÄ Preview-based manipulation for real-time feedback

children.style: display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; justify-content: end;
